author: cnbc.com
title: Ross Stores Announces First Quarter 2018 Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
Dublin, CA,
Dublin, California -- Ross Stores, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROST) will announce its first quarter 2018 earnings results on Thursday, May 24, 2018. A press release will be sent out at approximately 4:00 p.m. Eastern time.
The Company will also provide additional details concerning its first quarter 2018 results and business outlook on a conference call to be held on Thursday, May 24, 2018 at 4:15 p.m. Eastern time. Participants may listen to a real-time audio webcast of the conference call by visiting the Investors section of the Companyâ€™s website located at www.rossstores.com .
A recorded version of the call will also be available at the website address, as well as via a telephone recording at 404-537-3406, Passcode #9193075, through 11:30 p.m. Eastern time on May 31, 2018. Julie Chapman 925-965-4535 juliea.chapman@ros.com
Source:Ross Stores, Inc.
